Windlord:

"Windlord reporting, lord Perseus"said the male by com link "Tol=
d me what area need to be covered"
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: =
Kraftlos 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Tuesday, October 30, 2007 1=
0:21 PM
  Subject: Re: THE MINIONS OF UNICRON HAVE COME!


  The flight hea=
t-seeking missiles race through the air toward Scourge.  As they had now un=
doubtedly attracted attention from the sweeps, half the crew attempts fire =
at the nearby sweeps as the commander pushes buttons on the battery pulling=
 the missile site back into the protective door on the side of the pit/moat=
 below the tower (this process leaves them vulnerable to attack briefly). 
=

  Lord Perseus reaches a somewhat less-open position, pulls out his blast =
riffle (a repeating riffle, which somewhat more powerful and accurate than =
his arm cannons) and begins firing upon the onslaught of sweeps circling th=
e city.  The trooper follows suit. 

  Ravenchief continues firing at Cyclo=
nus with his pistols.  The four missiles he fired tried to lock onto Cyclon=
us heat signature and were closing fast.

  As sweeps go by the front of th=
e base, the turrets on the front door open fire as well as Guardia. 

  "Sa=
lveo here.  We might be getting some assistance from our pals, no word as t=
o when they'll be arriving.  The shields are holding and appear to have qui=
te a bit of life left in them.  The base is locked down." 

  "Understood..=
. " Perseus replied, "I had no idea that there were so many minions on eart=
h, how could so many have been hiding all this time without us detecting th=
em?"



  On 10/29/07, Kraftlos <kraftlos@...> wrote:
    OOC: Doc ha=
s been on top of a building, I think he went down to the railing, but that =
railing is 100 over the water, the port is almost as low.  Everyone except =
Perseus and the troopers are on the main level of the city or inside the ba=
ses' defenses. 

    BIC:

    Defensive shields go up over many of the key=
 buildings inside the city, including the tower.  (so no one can land on it=
 now).  Missile battery #2 close to the tower opens fire first, six anti-ai=
rcraft missiles fly toward Scourge. 

    As Scourge strafes Ravenchief, he=
 does a sort of mid-air front-flip and flies above Scourge as he passes by.=
  He continues to fire at Cyclonus launching a couple missiles from each of=
 his arm cannons and flying closer to his target. 

    Lord Perseus hurrie=
s up the ramp with his troopers and takes a good hard look at the battle th=
at has already started.  He motions to one of the troopers, who immediately=
 takes off down a side-alleyway, the other one follows him to the central r=
oadway in the city and they look for cover. 

    Salveo radios the allies =
at the other Maximal Base.

    "We are under attack from multiple minion t=
argets.  Please assist if possible."

    Guardia continues to watch and wa=
its to resist any approach on the main entrance of the base. 

    "Perseus=
 to all Maximals, status report as soon as possible.  Thank you." he said i=
nto the radio.



    On 10/29/07, Super Cyclonus < supercyclonus@...=
> wrote:
      OOC: If I have forgotten anyone PLEASE let me know. Also I h=
ave to
      assume that Doc is firing at the sweeps, which btw look almost=

      identical to Scourge, since Doc is some distance from Scourge and
  =
    cannot see him from his vantage point. If that is incorrect please let
=
      me know and I will make changes.

      BIC:

      In the air sweeps=
 continue to rain firepower on city below. In some
      places people are =
continuing to be corralled into larger building
      structures, while in =
other places the sweeps fire with seeming abandon.
      With a frightening=
 intelligence a few 'wings' of sweeps break off and
      begin to target t=
he anti-aircraft batteries, disintegration beams
      cutting through skie=
s like energized ginsue knives. 

      Meanwhile in the air a short distan=
ce from the maximal base
      Ravenchief's volley of missiles flew at Cycl=
onus, only to be evaded by
      the craft. Boosters flared as Cyclonus swu=
ng to one side, allowing the
      missiles to fly past him. With a short b=
urst of cannon fire he blew
      them out of the sky, and then he continue=
d on. 

      However Ravenchief was not to be left without company, Scourg=
e banked
      around also, his sweep craft uniquely agile and swift. As he=
 came
      around a red targeting laser blared out 'painting' Ravenchief, =
"You are
      a fool to stand against us Maximal! You only have terminatio=
n to look
      forward to!" Scourge opened up with his acid cannons!

    =
  On the shoreline the sweeps lost interest in searching for Trelos,
      =
perhaps they lost his scent, so turned their attention to Doc. 

      As D=
oc's blast lanced out, catching one sweep in the wing casing it to
      sm=
oke a little. Meanwhile the unmistakable smell of acid began filling
      =
the air as red targeting beams danced around Doc's position and two
      o=
ther sweeps began to open fire on Doc.

      On the railing above Doc's po=
sition, Kup managed to hit one of the
      sweeps but the other - either i=
t was more agile or more lucky - but it
      managed to avoid him. Even as=
 that happened several other sweeps swung
      into position ready to open=
 fire as targeting beams lanced out again,
      but just suddenly they bro=
ke position! 

      The reason for this became more evident as the now ope=
n air rippled and
      twin missiles approached Kup and Rodimus' positions=
, fire and wind
      trailing behind them like a vortex. As the missiles a=
pproached it was
      obvious that they were the same type of missiles fir=
ed from Cyclonus
      earlier and that these missiles were going to do qui=
te a bit of damage!

      At the Maximal base, sweeps continued to pound o=
n it in an attempt to
      break its shield defenses!

      OOC: Don't fo=
rget Nightstrike and Darkfate were commanded by Cyclonus
      to either ta=
ke the Maximal base or Destroy it with the help of the
      sweeps left be=
hind.

      __________________________________________________
      Do Yo=
u Yahoo!?
      Tired of spam? Yahoo! Mail has the best spam protection aro=
und 
      http://mail.yahoo.com
